        ```js
        console.log('Hello, world!');
        ```
        <!--Python-->
        ```py
        print('Hello, world!')
        ```
        
        <!--C-->
        ```C
        #include <stdio.h>
        
        int main() {
           printf("Hello World!");
           return 0;
        }
        ```
        
        <!--Pascal-->
        ```Pascal
        program HelloWorld;
        begin
          WriteLn('Hello, world!');
        end.
        ```
